newsitem.title: THAILAND: RESEARCH ALERT-Buy Precious - Asia Equity.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT-Buy Precious - Asia Equity.

text.p: Asia Equity said on Tuesday that it rates Thailand's Precious Shipping a buy.
"We rate PSL a buy because of good management, expanding fleet and recovering charter rates," Asia Equity said.
A recent increase and expected further gains in the Baltic Freight Index favoured Precious and fellow Thai bulk carrier Thoresen Thai, Asia Equity said.
The Baltic Freight Index (BAFI) is a measure of freight rates charged by large bulk carriers with a draught weight of more than 50,000 tonnes.
Asia Equity said charter rates for Precious vessels had risen to US$6,200 per vessel per day, against US$5,800 last quarter.
"Thoresen is rated a speculative buy because of the improving age profile of its fleet due to new ship acquisitions and recovering charter rates," the report said.

While the rising BAFI index does not directly affect Precious and Thoresen, which operate small handy-sized vessels, further gains in the index are expected to raise charter rates for all bulk carriers, Asia Equity said.
The BAFI Index stands at 1423 against a historic low of 992 in September and is expected to move higher after a period of consolidation, Asia Equity said.
